sense.name: what banks do
sense.commentary: BANKING[+event] engaging in the business of baking; maintaining savings and checking accounts and issuing loans and credit etc.
sense.examples: Banking one of many businesses that employs the use of mathematics.

sense.name: what bank customers do
sense.commentary: BANKING[+event] transacting business with a bank; depositing or withdrawing funds or requesting a loan etc.
sense.examples: John does always does his banking two minutes before closing time. Online banking is simple and convenient.
